insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE());
insert into MEM_TBL (MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NM, FILE_IDX) values (#{mem_id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key})), #{mem_nick}, #{mem_nm}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
mapper.select: select MEM_ID, MEM_NICK, MEM_NM from MEM_TBL limit 10 offset #{offset};

select M.MEM_ID as mem_id, M.MEM_NICK as mem_nick, M.MEM_NM as mem_nm, M.MEM_STAT as mem_stat, M.ACVT as acvt, F.FILE_PATH as file_path from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};
mapper.update: update MEM_TBL M LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_TBL F ON M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX SET M.MEM_PWD = hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key})), M.MEM_NICK = #{mem_nick}, M.MEM_NM = #{mem_nm}, F.FILE_PATH = #{file_path} where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};
mapper.select: select M.MEM_ID as mem_id, M.MEM_NICK as mem_nick, M.MEM_NM as mem_nm, M.MEM_STAT as mem_stat, F.FILE_PATH as file_path from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} and M.ACVT = 1 and M.MEM_PWD = hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key}));
